list.name: Changes
list.comment:
invoice work status tracking, factory improvements & bug fixes
## Features - Add WorkStatus enum for tracking factory progress (PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED) - Add LineStatus for individual invoice line tracking - Real-time WebSocket notifications for line and invoice status changes - Factory page: status change buttons (Start Work, Complete) - Factory page: hide completed jobs toggle filter - Display work status in InvoiceList and InvoiceDetailsPage - Company logo display in sidebar with fallback - Invoice details page with full status display
## Bug Fixes - Fix CASH customer payment validation using tolerance-based float comparison - Fix inconsistent dimensionUnit defaults (standardized to CM) - Fix dark mode toggle RTL direction - Fix PdfGenerationService syntax error - Fix Hibernate orphan deletion error in FactoryController - Add max operations limit (10) per invoice line
## Backend Changes - Add WorkStatus and LineStatus enums - Add workStatus field to Invoice model with auto-calculation - Add /factory/line/{id}/status endpoint for status updates - WebSocket notifications for status changes - CompanyProfileService returns API URL for logo display
## Frontend Changes - FactoryWorkerPage: status buttons, hide completed toggle - InvoiceList: workStatus column - InvoiceDetailsPage: workStatus badges - Sidebar: company logo fetching and display - Enhanced translations (AR/EN) for all new features

task.summary: Default task
fixing flow
fixing flow
add: disable minio service
add: disable minio service v2
add: disable minio service v2

Login Page adjustment
vercel config

feat: Add professional dashboard with full backend integration and dark mode support
- Implement comprehensive dashboard with real-time statistics from backend - Add role-based views (Owner, Cashier, Worker) with different metrics - Create DashboardController with 7 RESTful endpoints for analytics - Implement dashboardService for clean API integration - Add DTOs to resolve Hibernate lazy loading serialization issues - Display recent invoices with customer information - Include quick action cards for common tasks - Add performance metrics with progress bars (Owner only) - Implement full dark mode support across all dashboard components - Support RTL/Arabic layout with proper text alignment - Add loading states with skeleton loaders - Implement error handling with retry functionality - Create responsive grid layouts for all screen sizes - Use Tailwind dark mode variants for seamless theme switching
Backend: - DashboardController.java with stats, revenue, and recent invoices endpoints - Convert entities to DTOs to avoid Jackson serialization errors - Support filtering by date ranges and periods
Frontend: - DashboardPage.jsx with StatsCard, QuickActionCard, and InvoiceRow components - dashboardService.js for API communication - Full integration with existing authentication and permissions system

feat: Add professional dashboard with full backend integration and dark mode support
- Implement comprehensive dashboard with real-time statistics from backend - Add role-based views (Owner, Cashier, Worker) with different metrics - Create DashboardController with 7 RESTful endpoints for analytics - Implement dashboardService for clean API integration - Add DTOs to resolve Hibernate lazy loading serialization issues - Display recent invoices with customer information - Include quick action cards for common tasks - Add performance metrics with progress bars (Owner only) - Implement full dark mode support across all dashboard components - Support RTL/Arabic layout with proper text alignment - Add loading states with skeleton loaders - Implement error handling with retry functionality - Create responsive grid layouts for all screen sizes - Use Tailwind dark mode variants for seamless theme switching
Backend: - DashboardController.java with stats, revenue, and recent invoices endpoints - Convert entities to DTOs to avoid Jackson serialization errors - Support filtering by date ranges and periods
Frontend: - DashboardPage.jsx with StatsCard, QuickActionCard, and InvoiceRow components - dashboardService.js for API communication - Full integration with existing authentication and permissions system

feat: Add professional dashboard with full backend integration and dark mode support
- Implement comprehensive dashboard with real-time statistics from backend - Add role-based views (Owner, Cashier, Worker) with different metrics - Create DashboardController with 7 RESTful endpoints for analytics - Implement dashboardService for clean API integration - Add DTOs to resolve Hibernate lazy loading serialization issues - Display recent invoices with customer information - Include quick action cards for common tasks - Add performance metrics with progress bars (Owner only) - Implement full dark mode support across all dashboard components - Support RTL/Arabic layout with proper text alignment - Add loading states with skeleton loaders - Implement error handling with retry functionality - Create responsive grid layouts for all screen sizes - Use Tailwind dark mode variants for seamless theme switching

Frontend: - DashboardPage.jsx with StatsCard, QuickActionCard, and InvoiceRow components - dashboardService.js for API communication - Full integration with existing authentication and permissions system

feat: Enhanced Shataf & Customer Payment System
Major system upgrade implementing comprehensive shataf calculation system with 10 types and 12 farma formulas, plus enhanced customer payment management.
Backend Changes: - Add ShatafType enum with 10 types (KHARAZAN, SHAMBORLEH, ONE_CM, TWO_CM, THREE_CM, JULIA, LASER, ROTATION, TABLEAUX, SANDING) - Add FarmaType enum with 12 formulas and built-in calculation methods - Add ShatafRate entity for thickness-based pricing management - Add InvoiceLineEnhanced model supporting new shataf/farma fields - Add ShatafRateRepository with custom queries and overlap detection - Add ShatafRateService with business logic and default rate initialization - Add EnhancedShatafCuttingStrategy supporting formula-based, manual, and area-based calculations - Add ShatafRateController with 9 REST API endpoints - Add DTOs: ShatafRateDTO, CreateInvoiceLineRequestEnhanced
Frontend Changes: - Add shatafTypes.js constants with metadata and helper functions - Add farmaUtils.js with all 12 farma formula calculations - Add shatafRateService.js API client with rate management methods
Database Changes: - Add shataf_rates table with unique constraints - Add columns to invoice_line: shataf_type, farma_type, diameter, shataf_meters, cutting_rate, glass_price, manual_cutting_price - Add performance indexes for optimized queries - Include data migration scripts for backward compatibility
Features: - Formula-based shataf types (6): pricing depends on glass thickness and farma formula - Manual input types (3): LASER, ROTATION, TABLEAUX with manual price entry - Area-based type (1): SANDING calculated per square meter - 12 farma formulas: NORMAL_SHATAF, ONE_HEAD_FARMA, TWO_HEAD_FARMA, ONE_SIDE_FARMA, TWO_SIDE_FARMA, HEAD_SIDE_FARMA, TWO_HEAD_ONE_SIDE_FARMA, TWO_SIDE_ONE_HEAD_FARMA, FULL_FARMA, WHEEL_CUT, ROTATION, TABLEAUX - Customer balance management: CASH (must pay full), REGULAR/COMPANY (can have balance) - Automatic balance tracking and validation - Rate management API with bulk updates and default initialization
Documentation: - Add comprehensive implementation guide with API reference - Add detailed usage examples with calculations - Add complete TODO checklist with testing requirements - Add database migration SQL with validation queries - Add files summary with integration roadmap
Breaking Changes: - None - fully backward compatible with existing CuttingType system - Legacy SHATF/LASER types continue to work
Next Steps: - Frontend UI component integration (InvoiceLineForm, ShatafTypeSelector, FarmaTypeSelector) - Admin panel for rate management - Comprehensive testing suite - Production deployment
Files: 18 total (10 backend + 3 frontend + 5 docs) Size: ~133 KB Status: Backend 90% complete, Frontend 30% complete, Docs 100% complete

feat: Enhanced Shataf & Customer Payment System
Major system upgrade implementing comprehensive shataf calculation system with 10 types and 12 farma formulas, plus enhanced customer payment management.
Backend Changes: - Add ShatafType enum with 10 types (KHARAZAN, SHAMBORLEH, ONE_CM, TWO_CM, THREE_CM, JULIA, LASER, ROTATION, TABLEAUX, SANDING) - Add FarmaType enum with 12 formulas and built-in calculation methods - Add ShatafRate entity for thickness-based pricing management - Add InvoiceLineEnhanced model supporting new shataf/farma fields - Add ShatafRateRepository with custom queries and overlap detection - Add ShatafRateService with business logic and default rate initialization - Add EnhancedShatafCuttingStrategy supporting formula-based, manual, and area-based calculations - Add ShatafRateController with 9 REST API endpoints - Add DTOs: ShatafRateDTO, CreateInvoiceLineRequestEnhanced
Frontend Changes: - Add shatafTypes.js constants with metadata and helper functions - Add farmaUtils.js with all 12 farma formula calculations - Add shatafRateService.js API client with rate management methods
Database Changes: - Add shataf_rates table with unique constraints - Add columns to invoice_line: shataf_type, farma_type, diameter, shataf_meters, cutting_rate, glass_price, manual_cutting_price - Add performance indexes for optimized queries - Include data migration scripts for backward compatibility
Features: - Formula-based shataf types (6): pricing depends on glass thickness and farma formula - Manual input types (3): LASER, ROTATION, TABLEAUX with manual price entry - Area-based type (1): SANDING calculated per square meter - 12 farma formulas: NORMAL_SHATAF, ONE_HEAD_FARMA, TWO_HEAD_FARMA, ONE_SIDE_FARMA, TWO_SIDE_FARMA, HEAD_SIDE_FARMA, TWO_HEAD_ONE_SIDE_FARMA, TWO_SIDE_ONE_HEAD_FARMA, FULL_FARMA, WHEEL_CUT, ROTATION, TABLEAUX - Customer balance management: CASH (must pay full), REGULAR/COMPANY (can have balance) - Automatic balance tracking and validation - Rate management API with bulk updates and default initialization

Breaking Changes: - None - fully backward compatible with existing CuttingType system - Legacy SHATF/LASER types continue to work
Next Steps: - Frontend UI component integration (InvoiceLineForm, ShatafTypeSelector, FarmaTypeSelector) - Admin panel for rate management - Comprehensive testing suite - Production deployment
Files: 18 total (10 backend + 3 frontend + 5 docs) Size: ~133 KB Status: Backend 90% complete, Frontend 30% complete, Docs 100% complete

feat: Add multi-operation invoice system with enhanced cashier UI
Implement comprehensive invoice line operation support with multiple glass cutting types (Farma, Shataf) and enhanced cashier interface components.
Backend changes: - Update InvoiceLine model to support multiple operations per line - Enhance CreateInvoiceLineRequest and PreviewLineRequest DTOs for operations - Refactor InvoiceService to handle complex multi-operation calculations - Add support for Farma type configurations in GlassType model
Frontend changes: - Add EnhancedProductEntry component for detailed invoice line creation - Implement FarmaTypeSelector and ShatafTypeSelector for type-specific inputs - Create PaymentPanel for streamlined payment processing - Add InvoiceConfirmationDialog for order review before submission - Enhance glassTypeService with Farma type utilities - Update cashier workflow components for better UX - Add farmaTypes constants and utilities

Refactor invoice PDF generation and fix paid invoice modal issues
- Updated invoice PDF layout to match the new clean design without extra fields - Added support for sublines under each main invoice item with proper indentation - Simplified totals section to include only net total and final total - Improved supplier and customer info layout in a two-column structure - Fixed issue where paid invoice modal displayed null values due to incorrect state mapping - Ensured InvoiceViewModal receives correct props and opens properly from InvoicesPage - Corrected field mapping in CashierInvoicePage so paid invoices load accurate data - Add multi-output printing workflow: customer invoice, company invoice, and factory sticker - Implemented separate layouts for each print type and ensured correct data mapping for printing and production operations - Fix invoice financial logic, partial payments, and customer balance handling - Resolved issue where partial payments produced negative customer balances - Corrected calculation flow so remaining invoice amounts are handled properly without deducting from customer credit

Refactor invoice PDF generation and fix paid invoice modal issues
- Updated invoice PDF layout to match the new clean design without extra fields - Added support for sublines under each main invoice item with proper indentation - Simplified totals section to include only net total and final total - Improved supplier and customer info layout in a two-column structure - Fixed issue where paid invoice modal displayed null values due to incorrect state mapping - Ensured InvoiceViewModal receives correct props and opens properly from InvoicesPage - Corrected field mapping in CashierInvoicePage so paid invoices load accurate data - Add multi-output printing workflow: customer invoice, company invoice, and factory sticker - Implemented separate layouts for each print type and ensured correct data mapping for printing and production operations - Fix invoice financial logic, partial payments, and customer balance handling - Resolved issue where partial payments produced negative customer balances - Corrected calculation flow so remaining invoice amounts are handled properly without deducting from customer credit

Refactor invoice PDF generation and fix paid invoice modal issues
- Updated invoice PDF layout to match the new clean design without extra fields - Added support for sublines under each main invoice item with proper indentation - Simplified totals section to include only net total and final total - Improved supplier and customer info layout in a two-column structure - Fixed issue where paid invoice modal displayed null values due to incorrect state mapping - Ensured InvoiceViewModal receives correct props and opens properly from InvoicesPage - Corrected field mapping in CashierInvoicePage so paid invoices load accurate data - Add multi-output printing workflow: customer invoice, company invoice, and factory sticker - Implemented separate layouts for each print type and ensured correct data mapping for printing and production operations - Fix invoice financial logic, partial payments, and customer balance handling - Resolved issue where partial payments produced negative customer balances - Corrected calculation flow so remaining invoice amounts are handled properly without deducting from customer credit
minio and s3 config
feat(minio and s3 config): s3 url fix
**feat:** prevent duplicate phone numbers **feat:** fix S3 path URL handling
**feat:** prevent duplicate phone numbers **feat:** fix S3 path URL handling

Optimize invoice PDF generation with URL caching
- Added 'pdfUrl' field to Invoice entity to cache generated PDF links. - Updated PrintJobService to check for existing PDF URL before generating CLIENT type invoices. - Implemented logic to reuse cached URLs, reducing redundant processing and storage operations. - Ensures generated PDF URLs are persisted to the invoice record for future use."

Optimize invoice PDF generation with URL caching
- Added 'pdfUrl' field to Invoice entity to cache generated PDF links. - Updated PrintJobService to check for existing PDF URL before generating CLIENT type invoices. - Implemented logic to reuse cached URLs, reducing redundant processing and storage operations. - Ensures generated PDF URLs are persisted to the invoice record for future use."

invoice work status tracking, factory improvements & bug fixes
## Features - Add WorkStatus enum for tracking factory progress (PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED) - Add LineStatus for individual invoice line tracking - Real-time WebSocket notifications for line and invoice status changes - Factory page: status change buttons (Start Work, Complete) - Factory page: hide completed jobs toggle filter - Display work status in InvoiceList and InvoiceDetailsPage - Company logo display in sidebar with fallback - Invoice details page with full status display
## Bug Fixes - Fix CASH customer payment validation using tolerance-based float comparison - Fix inconsistent dimensionUnit defaults (standardized to CM) - Fix dark mode toggle RTL direction - Fix PdfGenerationService syntax error - Fix Hibernate orphan deletion error in FactoryController - Add max operations limit (10) per invoice line
## Backend Changes - Add WorkStatus and LineStatus enums - Add workStatus field to Invoice model with auto-calculation - Add /factory/line/{id}/status endpoint for status updates - WebSocket notifications for status changes - CompanyProfileService returns API URL for logo display
## Frontend Changes - FactoryWorkerPage: status buttons, hide completed toggle - InvoiceList: workStatus column - InvoiceDetailsPage: workStatus badges - Sidebar: company logo fetching and display - Enhanced translations (AR/EN) for all new features

MESSAGE.value:
feat: refactor invoice creation to use customer ID and add DTO layer
BREAKING CHANGES: - Invoice creation now requires customerId instead of customer details - API responses now return DTOs instead of raw entities
Backend Changes: - Refactored CreateInvoiceRequest to use customerId for proper customer linking - Added comprehensive error handling with Arabic error messages - Implemented InvoiceDTO, CustomerDTO, InvoiceLineDTO, and GlassTypeDTO - Fixed Hibernate lazy loading serialization issues (ByteBuddyInterceptor error) - Enhanced invoice retrieval with filtering by customerId, status, and date range - Added proper input validation and boundary checks - Improved logging with structured debug and error messages - Added transaction management and rollback handling - Separated invoice line processing into dedicated methods - Implemented partial success handling for invoice lines
Frontend Changes: - Fixed DataTable component to handle Spring Boot paginated responses - Added safe data extraction for various response structures - Enhanced error handling and null safety in DataTable - Improved sorting with nested property support and Arabic locale - Added development debug mode for troubleshooting
New Exception Classes: - CustomerNotFoundException, CustomerLookupException - InvoiceCreationException, InvoiceLineCreationException - InvoiceUpdateException, InvoiceReloadException - GlassTypeNotFoundException, InvalidDimensionsException - CuttingCalculationException, WebSocketException
Repository Methods: - findByCustomerId(Long, Pageable) - findByStatus(InvoiceStatus, Pageable) - countByCustomerId(Long)
Performance Improvements: - DTO conversion prevents N+1 query issues - List views exclude invoice lines for faster loading - Detail views use optimized fetch joins
Benefits: - Better data integrity with customer FK relationships - Eliminates duplicate customer records - Clean, stable JSON API responses - Improved customer tracking and analytics - RTL and Arabic-first throughout

Frontend: - DashboardPage.jsx with StatsCard, QuickActionCard, and InvoiceRow components - dashboardService.js for API communication - Full integration with existing authentication and permissions system

feat: Add multi-operation invoice system with enhanced cashier UI
Implement comprehensive invoice line operation support with multiple glass cutting types (Farma, Shataf) and enhanced cashier interface components.
Backend changes: - Update InvoiceLine model to support multiple operations per line - Enhance CreateInvoiceLineRequest and PreviewLineRequest DTOs for operations - Refactor InvoiceService to handle complex multi-operation calculations - Add support for Farma type configurations in GlassType model
Frontend changes: - Add EnhancedProductEntry component for detailed invoice line creation - Implement FarmaTypeSelector and ShatafTypeSelector for type-specific inputs - Create PaymentPanel for streamlined payment processing - Add InvoiceConfirmationDialog for order review before submission - Enhance glassTypeService with Farma type utilities - Update cashier workflow components for better UX - Add farmaTypes constants and utilities

Refactor invoice PDF generation and fix paid invoice modal issues
- Updated invoice PDF layout to match the new clean design without extra fields - Added support for sublines under each main invoice item with proper indentation - Simplified totals section to include only net total and final total - Improved supplier and customer info layout in a two-column structure - Fixed issue where paid invoice modal displayed null values due to incorrect state mapping - Ensured InvoiceViewModal receives correct props and opens properly from InvoicesPage - Corrected field mapping in CashierInvoicePage so paid invoices load accurate data - Add multi-output printing workflow: customer invoice, company invoice, and factory sticker - Implemented separate layouts for each print type and ensured correct data mapping for printing and production operations - Fix invoice financial logic, partial payments, and customer balance handling - Resolved issue where partial payments produced negative customer balances - Corrected calculation flow so remaining invoice amounts are handled properly without deducting from customer credit
feat(minio and s3 config): s3 url fix
**feat:** prevent duplicate phone numbers **feat:** fix S3 path URL handling

git commit -am "perf: Optimize invoice PDF generation with URL caching
- Added 'pdfUrl' field to Invoice entity to cache generated PDF links. - Updated PrintJobService to check for existing PDF URL before generating CLIENT type invoices. - Implemented logic to reuse cached URLs, reducing redundant processing and storage operations. - Ensures generated PDF URLs are persisted to the invoice record for future use."

Optimize invoice PDF generation with URL caching
- Added 'pdfUrl' field to Invoice entity to cache generated PDF links. - Updated PrintJobService to check for existing PDF URL before generating CLIENT type invoices. - Implemented logic to reuse cached URLs, reducing redundant processing and storage operations. - Ensures generated PDF URLs are persisted to the invoice record for future use."

## Bug Fixes - Fix CASH customer payment validation using tolerance-based float comparison - Fix inconsistent dimensionUnit defaults (standardized to CM) - Fix dark mode toggle RTL direction - Fix PdfGenerationService syntax error - Fix Hibernate orphan deletion error in FactoryController - Add max operations limit (10) per invoice line
## Backend Changes - Add WorkStatus and LineStatus enums - Add workStatus field to Invoice model with auto-calculation - Add /factory/line/{id}/status endpoint for status updates - WebSocket notifications for status changes - CompanyProfileService returns API URL for logo display
## Frontend Changes - FactoryWorkerPage: status buttons, hide completed toggle - InvoiceList: workStatus column - InvoiceDetailsPage: workStatus badges - Sidebar: company logo fetching and display - Enhanced translations (AR/EN) for all new features

invoice work status tracking, factory improvements & bug fixes
## Features - Add WorkStatus enum for tracking factory progress (PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED) - Add LineStatus for individual invoice line tracking - Real-time WebSocket notifications for line and invoice status changes - Factory page: status change buttons (Start Work, Complete) - Factory page: hide completed jobs toggle filter - Display work status in InvoiceList and InvoiceDetailsPage - Company logo display in sidebar with fallback - Invoice details page with full status display
## Bug Fixes - Fix CASH customer payment validation using tolerance-based float comparison - Fix inconsistent dimensionUnit defaults (standardized to CM) - Fix dark mode toggle RTL direction - Fix PdfGenerationService syntax error - Fix Hibernate orphan deletion error in FactoryController - Add max operations limit (10) per invoice line
## Backend Changes - Add WorkStatus and LineStatus enums - Add workStatus field to Invoice model with auto-calculation - Add /factory/line/{id}/status endpoint for status updates - WebSocket notifications for status changes - CompanyProfileService returns API URL for logo display
## Frontend Changes - FactoryWorkerPage: status buttons, hide completed toggle - InvoiceList: workStatus column - InvoiceDetailsPage: workStatus badges - Sidebar: company logo fetching and display - Enhanced translations (AR/EN) for all new features
